info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 3 at 12:20PM EDT until October 6 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami FL
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, minor to moderate coastal flooding. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents.
* WHERE...Coastal Broward County and Coastal Miami Dade County.
* WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 8 PM EDT Monday. For the High Rip Current Risk, through Sunday morning.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don't swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

parameter.value: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT MONDAY... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County
